Description.content: Defines template models to be used by the sitemap editor for generating new container pages. Most of the configuration is added when a new template model is added via the sitemap editor. Read more on template models here.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Defines which properties get displayed under the "Basic Properties" tab for the property dialog in the ADE.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Defines detail pages used for the specified resource type in the sitemap.
